title: Update Yes-branch follow-up copy to remove “white”

requirements.summary: Change the Yes-branch success/follow-up message to the exact English string “You are right — here's tulips for you.” (no “white”), without altering any other behavior or visuals.
acceptanceCriteria: After the user clicks “Yes” (including after the forced-Yes flow), the visible follow-up message text is exactly: "You are right — here's tulips for you."
No user-facing follow-up message in the Yes-branch contains the word "white" in the phrase "here's ... tulips for you"
All other UI behavior (Yes/No branching and existing tulip visuals/animations) remains unchanged

file_operations.description: Update the DialogDescription text shown in the Yes-branch success modal to exactly: "You are right — here's tulips for you." (including the em dash and trailing period). Keep all existing tulip/lily visuals and animations unchanged. This modal uses the shadcn-ui Dialog components for the success message container; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
